trans-unit.source: Anomaly Detection
trans-unit.target: Anomaly Detection

trans-unit.source: What is Anomaly Detection?
trans-unit.target: What is Anomaly Detection?

trans-unit.source: Anomaly detection encompasses many important tasks in machine learning, and anomaly detection techniques are applicable in a broad range of scenarios:
trans-unit.target: Anomaly detection encompasses many important tasks in machine learning, and anomaly detection techniques are applicable in a broad range of scenarios:

trans-unit.source: Identifying transactions that are potentially fraudulent
trans-unit.target: Identifying transactions that are potentially fraudulent

trans-unit.source: Learning patterns that indicate a network intrusion has occurred
trans-unit.target: Learning patterns that indicate a network intrusion has occurred

trans-unit.source: Finding abnormal clusters of patients
trans-unit.target: Finding abnormal clusters of patients

trans-unit.source: Checking values input to a system
trans-unit.target: Checking values input to a system

trans-unit.source: Because anomalies are by definition rare events, it can be difficult to collect a representative sample of data that can be used for modeling.
trans-unit.target: Because anomalies are by definition rare events, it can be difficult to collect a representative sample of data that can be used for modeling.

trans-unit.source: The algorithms included in this section have been especially designed to address the core challenges of building and training models for anomaly detection using imbalanced datasets.
trans-unit.target: The algorithms included in this section have been especially designed to address the core challenges of building and training models for anomaly detection using imbalanced datasets.

trans-unit.source: Wondering if anomaly detection is the right algorithm for your task?
trans-unit.target: Wondering if anomaly detection is the right algorithm for your task?

trans-unit.target: Explains in greater detail the different types of machine learning algorithms and how they're used

trans-unit.source: Creates a one-class Support Vector Machine model for anomaly detection
trans-unit.target: Creates a one-class Support Vector Machine model for anomaly detection
